de.esoco.data.document

Class CsvDocumentWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.esoco.data.document.CsvDocumentWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TabularDocumentWriter<java.lang.String>

    public class CsvDocumentWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements TabularDocumentWriter<java.lang.String>
    A TabularDocumentWriter implementation for the CSV file format. The resulting document is a text string.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface de.esoco.data.document.TabularDocumentWriter
